channel.description: Recent content in Windows 10 on The Duck Channel´s Site

item.title: Archcraft with Btrfs and Dual Boot Windows 10 [2021]
item.description: Links Archcraft Btrfs 0. Intro Hi all, in this video i show how to install Archcraft with btrfs, snapshots, grub-btrfs, dual boot with Windows 10. The boot mode will be efi; I’m assuming you already have the latest usb stick with the Archcraft Linux ISO. You need install Windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! 1. Bios Considerations Reset BIOS to factory default and reboot.

item.title: How to Install EndeavourOS with Windows 10 Dual Boot
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install EndeavourOS Dual Boot with Windows 10. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the EndeavourOS ISO. You need install Windows 10 first. I will choose plasma as desktop environment. I hope you enjoy! Links Download EndeavourOS Create EndeavourOS Install Media EndeavourOS Wiki Steps #1. Bios Considerations

item.title: How to Install Linux Mint Dual Boot with Windows 10
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install Linux Mint with Windows 10 in Dual Boot. The boot mode will be EFI. I’m assuming you already have the usb stick with the Linux Mint ISO installation. You need install Windows 10 first. I hope you enjoy! Links Linux Mint - Download Steps 1. Prepare Windows 10 I will shrink the disk space about 30 Gb to install Linux Mint.

item.title: Arch Linux Dual Boot Windows 10
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Arch Linux Dual Boot with Windows 10. The bootloader utilized is Grub and boot mode is uefi. The Arch Linux installation will be only the base system with network and bootloader. I will use virtual machine, but the procedure is the same and it does not affect. I hope you enjoy! Bios Boot the PC and press the manufacturers key to open the BIOS.
